p:
Egypt is one of the biggest countries in the world in exporting the high-quality raw material of more than 150 medicinal and aromatic plants. The variety and massiveness of aromatic plant species in Egypt, stemming from the climatic conditions in its environment, may stimulate the accumulation of high concentrated secondary metabolites. This makes the Egyptian aromatic plants are considered between the most promising sources for many biologically active compounds
14 . Thus, there is an imperious need to extend the scientific knowledge base of the aromatic species in Egypt by the modern AI methodologies using machine and deep learning.
